creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: cut fragment of very dark blue (nearly black) fabric with red and white grid pattern; 'X' and 'O' shapes alternate throughout the grid openings; diagonal cut across bottom section
markings: verso UL, Thomas Murray Collection label: OKI 6048 | verso UL, Jack Lenor Larsen label: 880 20B
medium: Cloth: cotton; floating relief warp and weft (Yomitanzan hanaori), tate-yoko gasuri (double ikat)
title: Dark blue-ground fragment with white and red geometric pattern
